reviews.review: I honestly have to say that this is one of the best FPSs' I've ever played. Quite a few of my friends recomended it to me and I always said "Oh cool...I'll try it sometime >_>" . But I was so wrong in thinking this game was just overhyped. I love it!

Ha dato degli spunti ottimi per gli sparatutto moderni (anche se ci sono i giochi di errori di percorso). Non è un gioco nemmeno il gioco è IL GIOCO!!!!!!!!!!

Half-Life 2 это игра, вышедшая в 2004 году, и набравшая огромную популярность. Игра, с отличной графикой, и отменной физикой. Проходил, наверное, раз 10, и несколько не надоедает. Да и как может надоесть игра, с таким интересным сюжетом, которая, практически, не имеет минусов? Для меня эта игра навсегда останется самой любимой, захватывающей и конечно страшной!

A very solid game from beginning to end. Half-Life games are always well paced, and this one is no exception. You'll travel through canals, highways, deserted towns, and cities, and it feels like one long journey. Whereas the Half-Life 1 games all felt contained in one area, in Half-Life 2, it feels like you're going on an adventure... but a dark adventure, with zombies, and adorable widdle headcrabs. The physics puzzles seem kind of forced... probably because Valve wanted to show off physics in the Source engine. I definitely recommend this game, and if you can get Synergy going (free Steam download btw) you can play co-op with friends and try your hardest to break the game. It can seem a bit dry if you're used to more action-packed shooters. It prefers a slower, quiet atmosphere most of the time, but that's not a bad thing. It's just different. Half-Life 2 is a good, if slow, game that hasn't aged too poorly.

I've played many FPS games since I first finished HL2; still, this game is my favorite FPS of all time. It has an engaging story and  a fun gameplay. Graphics still look good and game physics are amazing. I love this game.

I've been playing PC and Console games since the '70s - I know some more o'ol-timers out there too :)  But I have to say that this is one of the best stories and gameplay I've experienced in a First Perspn POV shooter (I would add Mass Effect as well).  The graphics are stunning and physics/geometry are impressive.  While you don't say much as Gordon, however, your actions actions speak volumes.  Most interactivity as Gordon is fluid and intuitive - the developers were not trying to "trick" people like some of the newer games in this genre.  And a big KIDUS to Steam - thanks for keeping my stuff in the cloud and adding the badge "system." The badges add an extra fun and challenges when stepping up to a reply.  OOverall, I can't rate this game high enough, and I hope the team plans to add more quality game experiences.

You will do such things as robbing banks, running across streets with fast-moving traffic, go down warp pipes, get accosted by the ninja turtles and A-Team, steal the tardis, and team up with doctor Brown.


That's just the first chapter.

An amazing game set in a postapocalyptic world, destroyed by aliens from a different dimension. You take on the role of Gorden Freeman to try and rid our world from the invaders. On your way throught this epic adventure you meet with a lot of people - from an under-cover rebell infiltrating the ranks of the aliens to a scients who has an alien pet. In a partion of the game your faithful companion will be the daughter of a scientist - Alyx Vans, who happens to have a huge robot pet. Embark on an edventure through beatiful landscapes and destroyed cities. Destroy your enemies using fun and futuristic weapons and drive through the ruins in half-broken vehicles. Control 4-legged aliens using their feromon pods to surprise your foes. This game is certainly worth your time and its in my top 10 games of all time.

No one should have to tell you how good this game is. Half-Life as a series is revered for a reason. This game well and truly sets itself apart by being impossibly good 10 years after it was first released. This sets the gold standard by which all other shooters are judged. It is worth playing twice just to listen to the developer commentary to go with it.

This is probably my favorite single-player game. I've played through it 5 times now, and it still leaves me wanting to go through it again. The story is enjoyable, the atmosphere phenomenal, and the gameplay is awesome. Building upon the storyline and mechanics of the original Half-Life, this 2006 sequel, like it's predecessor has become a benchmark for games.

An epic follow up of the original. This game takes you through the journey of one Dr. Gordon Freeman as he fights his way through the combine to take out Dr. Breen's Fortress in city 17. This game is a pioneer in physics and level design and has almost infinite replay value as you will not play it the same way through every time. The iconic crowbar and zero point energy gun will have fans grinning when you throw objects that are just a little too big at groups of combine. With a well thought out  story and solid gameplay, this game will keep you busy for hours. Be sure to check out the other two games, halflife episode 1 and 2 to continue the story. I would recommend this to anyone who enjoys a good story and a good adventure.

I've waited a long time for the sequel to release. It hasn't disappointed since.

Just when you think you were alone as nothing more than a scientist, everyone still recognizes you and considers you the hero. You have the plot laid down once you saw how miserable the people of the city walk around.

The new Source Engine's physics and graphics in the game show great fun and at times make you want to enjoy the scenery, if not for the Combine to keep your head back into the action. Valve didn't over-indulge on the eye candy, as Alyx Vance becomes more helpful than hot. The engine certainly motivated my friends to want their hands on the engine's tools to see what they can create, mods or movies.

The heroes in each chapter are handy to have around for the time being, and you know when you have to progress through the game further alone. Yet even though at times you are not with a companion, there is a special thing here and there that gets you places (dune buggy and airboat for example) and make you understand that there's more to the game franchise than merely running and gunning. This can be a negative if you're not into puzzle-solving.

It even has its own creep factor at times. No intentional jump scares, but as usual, headcrabs and zombies lurk around in hordes. The addendum being there are various types now, and they add to the challenge and scariness in their own way. The game has it's dark and grimdark areas, and with thoughtful ways to progress and combat through them.

Half life is the scientific term used to describe the time for a material to decay to half its mass. Lambda, the game's logo, is the related decay constant. I think this game is falsely advertised; I expected to be challenged with many problems regarding nuclear physics. I was deceived Gaben. I will not forget this treachery. DO NOT BUY!

Half-Life 2 to gra akcji FPS/akcji. Poraz kolejny wcielamy się w Gordona Freeman'a ,który znów musi uratować świat.Tym razem zmierzymy się z Kombinatem i innymi stworzeniami które za wszelką cenę chcą nas zabić.Ogólnie gra się bardzo dobrze jest przyjemna, poziom trudności jest zadawalający, fabuła napewno na plus. Podsumowując:
+Dobra grafika
+Świetna optymalizacja(silnik source)
+Fabuła
-Mała swoboda
-Dość mały arsenał
-Brak możliwości latania(samoloty,helikoptery)
Ogólna ocena gry 9/10. Bardzo dobry tytuł w który warto zagrać!
